entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as someone who knows it can't happen and isn't expecting anything romantic with Harry. She's also visualized by Harry in a white dress marrying a stranger.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as feeling down and seeing only Voldemort ahead of him. He's also the one who has to deal with Ron's behavior.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking half resentful and sheepish after his behavior towards Ginny.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a threat to Harry's future.

relationships.description: Harry has romantic feelings for Ginny, but she doesn't seem to feel the same way.
Ron is giving unwanted attention to Ginny.
Harry sees Voldemort as a threat to his future.
